trans-unit.source: Implements an ASP.NET handler that forwards requests to the remoting HTTP channel.
trans-unit.target: 實作 ASP.NET 處理常式，將要求轉送至的遠端 HTTP 通道。

trans-unit.source: Custom HTTP handlers process specific, predefined types of HTTP requests.
trans-unit.target: 自訂 HTTP 處理常式處理特定的預先定義的 HTTP 要求的類型。

trans-unit.source: Executable code defined in the <xref:System.Web.IHttpHandler> classes, rather than conventional ASP or ASP.NET Web pages, responds to these specific requests.
trans-unit.target: 可執行程式碼中定義<xref:System.Web.IHttpHandler>類別，而不是傳統的 ASP 或 ASP.NET Web 網頁，這些特定要求的回應。</xref:System.Web.IHttpHandler>

trans-unit.source: HTTP handlers provide a way of interacting with the low-level request and response services of the IIS Web server, and provide functionality similar to ISAPI extensions but with a simpler programming model.
trans-unit.target: HTTP 處理常式提供的低層級的要求和回應服務的 IIS Web 伺服器，以互動的方式，並提供類似的功能到 ISAPI 擴充程式，但使用簡單的程式設計模型。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpRemotingHandler"></xref> class with default values.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpRemotingHandler"></xref>類別具有預設值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpRemotingHandler"></xref> class with default values.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpRemotingHandler"></xref>類別具有預設值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether another request can use the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpRemotingHandler"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得布林值，指出是否可以使用另一個要求<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpRemotingHandler"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> for all instances of <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpRemotingHandler"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>所有執行個體<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpRemotingHandler"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Enables processing of HTTP Web requests by the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 可讓處理 HTTP Web 要求的目前執行個體。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Web.IHttpHandler.ProcessRequest%2A> methods, see <xref:System.Web.IHttpHandler.ProcessRequest%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

A <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> that provides references to the intrinsic server objects (for example, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Request" name="Request" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Response" name="Response" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Session" name="Session" href=""></xref>, and <xref uid="langword_csharp_Server" name="Server" href=""></xref>) used to service HTTP requests.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref>提供內建伺服器物件的參考 (例如， <xref uid="langword_csharp_Request" name="Request" href=""> </xref>， <xref uid="langword_csharp_Response" name="Response" href=""> </xref>， <xref uid="langword_csharp_Session" name="Session" href=""> </xref>，和<xref uid="langword_csharp_Server" name="Server" href=""> </xref>) 用來服務 HTTP 要求。
